Sarcocornia) and shows Salicornia pacifica present in BC.Salicornia perennis is excluded. http://data.canadensys.net/vascan/search?q=sarcocorniaSo, you could move ahead of the pack and call your material Salicornia pacifica Standley sensu Piirianen et al. 2017 OR you could use the synonym Sarcocornia pacifica. I’ll propose the name change (Sarcocornia pacifica to Salicornia pacifica) for fall review, but it would not show up in Species Explorer/E-Flora until next year.” –MD
